amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Cloture motion on amendment SA 602 rendered moot in Senate.
Amendment SA 602 under the order of 9/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 135.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 602 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 602 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S5617) In the nature of a substitute.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 602 under the order of 9/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 135.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 602 under the order of 9/15/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 135.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 602 proposed by Senator Reid.
